HELP: I'll try, but I'm still learning.
NO: Ok. Got that.  Would you like to teach me? %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
NOT INTERESTED: Fair enough.  Would you like to teach me something? %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
TEACH UNNIBOT:
Ok.  Great!  Type a question you would like me to learn to answer and if possible type the answer also.
I probably will not understand it now, but I'll try and learn it the next time.
BYE: Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Goodbye!
